column4: for those wondering how to access wifi in KDE run in terminal nm-applet
FOR THOSE WHO WERE WONDERING ABOUT ACCESSING WIFI IN KDE run in terminal NM-APPLET; i think this information should be posted as from what I've seen a lot of people have asked about this.
A lot of people may ask it in #kubuntu but I don't see it often here, and nm-applet should be running by default
